actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend section 707 of the Social Security Act to extend for 1 year the existing authorization of grants for the expansion and development of grants for the undergraduate and graduate programs in social work.

summary.text: Extends for one year (through June 30, 1974) the existing authorization of grants for the expansion and development of undergraduate and graduate programs in social work.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 707 of the Social Security Act to extend for 1 year the existing authorization of grants for the expansion and development of grants for the undergraduate and graduate programs in social work.
